title: ‘The Circle’ Season 4, Episodes 9-12
description:
Jomi and Jodi return to recap Episodes 9-12 of Season 4 of Netflix’s ‘The Circle’. They discuss Yu Ling’s shocking betrayal, the capturing of a longtime catfish, and the disturbing results of the "Portrait Mode" challenge.
Hosts: Jomi Adeniran and Jodi Walker
Producers: Sasha Ashall and Devon Manze
Additional Production: Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
